overview: The “Dead Devils Death Bar” is a meeting place for various representatives of a newly-formed middle class, who drink and gossip. Their expectations of the place however, will remain unfulfilled, developing into a conspiratorial nightmare. In a single, continual tracking shot, the film narrates the course of one night, with only 9 actors playing the 26 bar patrons, as well as sometimes singing along with the sound-track.
title: Dead Devils Death Bar
